20110109160007.000|20110109165944.000|SEG|Type=Story
20110109160007.000|20110109160009.000|TR0|HOWARD KURTZ, HOST:  The massacre in 
20110109160009.000|20110109160011.000|TR0|Tucson has confronted those of us in the 
20110109160011.000|20110109160013.000|TR0|news business with painful questions about 
20110109160013.000|20110109160015.000|TR0|inaccurate deadline reporting, about 
20110109160015.000|20110109160018.000|TR0|excessive partisanship, and whether we're 
20110109160018.000|20110109160020.000|TR0|aiding and abetting a political blame game.
20110109160020.000|20110109160022.000|TR0|
20110109160022.000|20110109160024.000|TR0|While Gabrielle Giffords and the other 
20110109160024.000|20110109160027.000|TR0|victims of this horrifying shooting are 
20110109160027.000|20110109160029.000|TR0|still fighting for their lives, we will 
20110109160029.000|20110109160031.000|TR0|explore these questions this morning on 
20110109160031.000|20110109160033.000|TR0|RELIABLE SOURCES.
20110109160033.000|20110109160035.000|TR0|
20110109160035.000|20110109160038.000|TR0|The shooting of Arizona Congresswoman 
20110109160038.000|20110109160040.000|TR0|Gabrielle Giffords and 20 others yesterday 
20110109160040.000|20110109160042.000|TR0|at a routine political event raises 
20110109160042.000|20110109160044.000|TR0|questions we can't yet answer.  Journalism 
20110109160044.000|20110109160047.000|TR0|is or should be about sticking to what we 
20110109160047.000|20110109160049.000|TR0|know.  That principle was shattered at 
20110109160049.000|20110109160051.000|TR0|times yesterday afternoon, when some media 
20110109160051.000|20110109160053.000|TR0|outlets, including CNN, Fox News, and NPR, 
20110109160053.000|20110109160055.000|TR0|briefly reported that Congresswoman 
20110109160055.000|20110109160058.000|TR0|Giffords was dead, even as she was still 
20110109160058.000|20110109160100.000|TR0|in surgery, before pulling back.
20110109160100.000|20110109160102.000|TR0|
20110109160102.000|20110109160104.000|TR0|(BEGIN VIDEO CLIP)

20110109160109.000|20110109160111.000|TR0|people have been shot at a grocery store 
20110109160111.000|20110109160113.000|TR0|in Tucson, Arizona.

20110109160120.000|20110109160122.000|TR0|been shot, everyone.  Shot in the head.

20110109160131.000|20110109160133.000|TR0|died.

20110109160218.000|20110109160220.000|TR0|Giffords had been shot and killed.  And 
20110109160220.000|20110109160222.000|TR0|now Fox is confirming a source is saying 
20110109160222.000|20110109160225.000|TR0|she is still alive.
20110109160225.000|20110109160227.000|TR0|

20110109160229.000|20110109160231.000|TR0|conflicting reports now whether or not the 
20110109160231.000|20110109160233.000|TR0|congresswoman has, in fact, died.
20110109160233.000|20110109160236.000|TR0|

20110109160245.000|20110109160247.000|TR0|yet about his nationality.
20110109160247.000|20110109160249.000|TR0|

20110109160254.000|20110109160256.000|TR0|individual, Jared Lee Loughner, who's the 
20110109160256.000|20110109160258.000|TR0|suspected shooter in this case, 22 years 
20110109160258.000|20110109160300.000|TR0|old.
20110109160300.000|20110109160302.000|TR0|
20110109160302.000|20110109160305.000|TR0|SHEPARD SMITH, FOX NEWS:  They are 
20110109160305.000|20110109160307.000|TR0|actively pursuing an accomplice in this 
20110109160307.000|20110109160309.000|TR0|case, a white man in his 50s.  He is not 
20110109160309.000|20110109160311.000|TR0|now believed to have acted alone.

20110109160318.000|20110109160320.000|TR0|KURTZ:  And there are other temptations 
20110109160320.000|20110109160322.000|TR0|that journalists must resist.  Among them, 
20110109160322.000|20110109160325.000|TR0|jumping to conclusions about the 
20110109160325.000|20110109160327.000|TR0|motivation behind the shooting.  Was it 
20110109160327.000|20110109160329.000|TR0|related to a very tough campaign in which 
20110109160329.000|20110109160331.000|TR0|Giffords, an Arizona Democrat, was just 
20110109160331.000|20110109160334.000|TR0|re-elected, or her tough stance on border 
20110109160334.000|20110109160336.000|TR0|security?  Was it an outgrowth of the 
20110109160336.000|20110109160338.000|TR0|political polarization?
20110109160338.000|20110109160340.000|TR0|
20110109160340.000|20110109160343.000|TR0|We will proceed, cautiously, to examine 
20110109160343.000|20110109160345.000|TR0|this story and its coverage this morning.
20110109160345.000|20110109160347.000|TR0|
20110109160347.000|20110109160349.000|TR0|Joining me now here in Washington, Roger 
20110109160349.000|20110109160351.000|TR0|Simon, chief political columnist for 
20110109160351.000|20110109160354.000|TR0|"Politico"; Clarence Page, columnist for 
20110109160354.000|20110109160356.000|TR0|"The Chicago Tribune"; and in San 
20110109160356.000|20110109160358.000|TR0|Francisco, Debra Saunders, columnist for 
20110109160358.000|20110109160400.000|TR0|"The San Francisco Chronicle."
20110109160400.000|20110109160403.000|TR0|
20110109160403.000|20110109160405.000|TR0|You just saw that montage, Roger Simon, 
20110109160405.000|20110109160407.000|TR0|and you can't make a worse mistake than 
20110109160407.000|20110109160409.000|TR0|that, to declare a member of Congress 
20110109160409.000|20110109160411.000|TR0|dead.  And I find it disappointing, 
20110109160411.000|20110109160414.000|TR0|because we've been through so many stores 
20110109160414.000|20110109160416.000|TR0|like that, where fragmentary information 
20110109160416.000|20110109160418.000|TR0|turns out to be wrong.
20110109160418.000|20110109160420.000|TR0|
20110109160420.000|20110109160423.000|TR0|ROGER SIMON, CHIEF POLITICAL COLUMNIST, 
20110109160423.000|20110109160425.000|TR0|"POLITICO":  Well, you're always going to 
20110109160425.000|20110109160427.000|TR0|get certain things wrong on these stories. 
20110109160427.000|20110109160429.000|TR0| The number of dead always climbs and 
20110109160429.000|20110109160432.000|TR0|shrinks, and climbs again.
20110109160432.000|20110109160434.000|TR0|
20110109160434.000|20110109160436.000|TR0|I remember as a young school kid hearing 
20110109160436.000|20110109160438.000|TR0|that Vice President Johnson had been shot 
20110109160438.000|20110109160440.000|TR0|and President Kennedy had been wounded.  
20110109160440.000|20110109160443.000|TR0|That got flipped around.  The fact is, we 
20110109160443.000|20110109160445.000|TR0|go with what we hear.  That's often wrong.
20110109160445.000|20110109160447.000|TR0|
20110109160447.000|20110109160449.000|TR0|KURTZ:  But why not wait?  Look, we 
20110109160449.000|20110109160452.000|TR0|understand it's happening, you're seeing 
20110109160452.000|20110109160454.000|TR0|sort of news gathering in its roughest and 
20110109160454.000|20110109160456.000|TR0|rawest form. Why not wait until it's 
20110109160456.000|20110109160458.000|TR0|confirmed.  If she was dead, we would have 
20110109160458.000|20110109160500.000|TR0|found out 20 minutes later.
20110109160500.000|20110109160503.000|TR0|
20110109160503.000|20110109160505.000|TR0|CLARENCE PAGE, COLUMNIST, "THE CHICAGO 
20110109160505.000|20110109160507.000|TR0|TRIBUNE":  This is always the struggle in 
20110109160507.000|20110109160509.000|TR0|journalism, Howard.  As you know, daily 
20110109160509.000|20110109160512.000|TR0|journalism, especially a breaking story -- 
20110109160512.000|20110109160514.000|TR0|several years ago, I think on your 
20110109160514.000|20110109160516.000|TR0|program, I stated Page's Law, the first 
20110109160516.000|20110109160518.000|TR0|casualty of any major news event is the 
20110109160518.000|20110109160521.000|TR0|truth.
20110109160521.000|20110109160523.000|TR0|
20110109160523.000|20110109160525.000|TR0|And a major event like this, like the 
20110109160525.000|20110109160527.000|TR0|Ronald Reagan shooting and various other 
20110109160527.000|20110109160529.000|TR0|events in the past, the initial 
20110109160529.000|20110109160532.000|TR0|information is full of conflicts.  You've 
20110109160532.000|20110109160534.000|TR0|got reporters, you've got sources, you've 
20110109160534.000|20110109160536.000|TR0|got police passing rumors along.  You've 
20110109160536.000|20110109160538.000|TR0|got all kinds of things happening in a 
20110109160538.000|20110109160541.000|TR0|chaotic atmosphere in the early hours on a 
20110109160541.000|20110109160543.000|TR0|story like this, so we've all got to be 
20110109160543.000|20110109160545.000|TR0|very cautious whenever something breaks 
20110109160545.000|20110109160547.000|TR0|like this.
20110109160547.000|20110109160549.000|TR0|
20110109160549.000|20110109160552.000|TR0|KURTZ:  And on that point, Debra Saunders, 
20110109160552.000|20110109160554.000|TR0|a couple of hours after this tragic 
20110109160554.000|20110109160556.000|TR0|shooting, even as we weren't sure who was 
20110109160556.000|20110109160558.000|TR0|alive and who was dead, I Googled 
20110109160558.000|20110109160601.000|TR0|"Gabrielle Giffords" and "Sarah Palin."  
20110109160601.000|20110109160603.000|TR0|And lots of stories and blog posts came up 
20110109160603.000|20110109160605.000|TR0|talking about Sarah Palin, 10 months ago, 
20110109160605.000|20110109160607.000|TR0|putting up a map of the Democrats she 
20110109160607.000|20110109160610.000|TR0|wanted defeated, and using crosshairs, gun 
20110109160610.000|20110109160612.000|TR0|sites, to represent those targets, and, of 
20110109160612.000|20110109160614.000|TR0|course, she used the rhetoric about "Don't 
20110109160614.000|20110109160616.000|TR0|retreat, reload."
20110109160616.000|20110109160618.000|TR0|
20110109160618.000|20110109160621.000|TR0|And in a way that I found to be -- you 
20110109160621.000|20110109160623.000|TR0|know, first of all, I guess how about a 
20110109160623.000|20110109160625.000|TR0|decent interval?  The victims were still 
20110109160625.000|20110109160627.000|TR0|being rushed to surgery.  But I also felt 
20110109160627.000|20110109160630.000|TR0|like, was it fair to bring her into 
20110109160630.000|20110109160632.000|TR0|something that she had nothing to do with?
20110109160632.000|20110109160634.000|TR0|
20110109160634.000|20110109160636.000|TR0|DEBRA SAUNDERS, COLUMNIST, "THE SAN 
20110109160636.000|20110109160638.000|TR0|FRANCISCO CHRONICLE":  Well, it was 
20110109160638.000|20110109160641.000|TR0|ideological opportunism.  I mean, it's 
20110109160641.000|20110109160643.000|TR0|very human, when something like this 
20110109160643.000|20110109160645.000|TR0|happens, you want the villain to be the 
20110109160645.000|20110109160647.000|TR0|person you hate.  And so a lot of people 
20110109160647.000|20110109160650.000|TR0|rushed to do that.
20110109160650.000|20110109160652.000|TR0|
20110109160652.000|20110109160654.000|TR0|You know, I've got to tell you, I'm a 
20110109160654.000|20110109160656.000|TR0|conservative.  When I heard this story, my 
20110109160656.000|20110109160659.000|TR0|first thought was, oh, no, it's a 
20110109160659.000|20110109160701.000|TR0|right-wing nut with a gun.  And I think 
20110109160701.000|20110109160703.000|TR0|that these stories about the Tea Party 
20110109160703.000|20110109160705.000|TR0|being a ticking time bomb are crap.  I 
20110109160705.000|20110109160707.000|TR0|find them offensive, but we know that 
20110109160707.000|20110109160710.000|TR0|there are extremists.
20110109160710.000|20110109160712.000|TR0|
20110109160712.000|20110109160714.000|TR0|KURTZ:  But you said, oh, no, it's  a 
20110109160714.000|20110109160716.000|TR0|right-wing nut with a gun, because you 
20110109160716.000|20110109160719.000|TR0|feared that then anybody on the right 
20110109160719.000|20110109160721.000|TR0|would, by implication, be blamed for this

20110109160725.000|20110109160727.000|TR0|SAUNDERS:  No.  Because I feared it was 
20110109160727.000|20110109160730.000|TR0|true.  I mean, that was my first thought.
20110109160730.000|20110109160732.000|TR0|
20110109160732.000|20110109160734.000|TR0|KURTZ:  And let's say it was true.  Let's 
20110109160734.000|20110109160736.000|TR0|say it was true.
20110109160736.000|20110109160739.000|TR0|
20110109160739.000|20110109160741.000|TR0|SAUNDERS:  But you know, that's not our 
20110109160741.000|20110109160743.000|TR0|job.
20110109160743.000|20110109160745.000|TR0|
20110109160745.000|20110109160748.000|TR0|KURTZ:  Hold on.  Let's say it was a 
20110109160748.000|20110109160750.000|TR0|right-wing nut with a gun. It does seem to 
20110109160750.000|20110109160752.000|TR0|have been a nut, a guy -- a 22-year-old 
20110109160752.000|20110109160754.000|TR0|kid whose political ramblings are utterly 
20110109160754.000|20110109160756.000|TR0|incoherent.
20110109160756.000|20110109160759.000|TR0|
20110109160759.000|20110109160801.000|TR0|But so why should anyone else be blamed if 
20110109160801.000|20110109160803.000|TR0|it was a right-wing nut?  Which is was 
20110109160803.000|20110109160805.000|TR0|not, by the way.
20110109160805.000|20110109160808.000|TR0|
20110109160808.000|20110109160810.000|TR0|SAUNDERS:  No, it wasn't.  And I guess -- 
20110109160810.000|20110109160812.000|TR0|I mean, we know that there are extremists 
20110109160812.000|20110109160814.000|TR0|and we know that parties have to deal with 
20110109160814.000|20110109160816.000|TR0|the extremists on their side.

20110109160821.000|20110109160823.000|TR0|somebody in the business -- and let's -- 
20110109160823.000|20110109160825.000|TR0|six people are dead.  This is an awful 
20110109160825.000|20110109160828.000|TR0|tragedy.  A little girl who just got on 
20110109160828.000|20110109160830.000|TR0|the student council shot.  So this is just 
20110109160830.000|20110109160832.000|TR0|-- this is not a political event.
20110109160832.000|20110109160834.000|TR0|
20110109160834.000|20110109160837.000|TR0|KURTZ:  It's awful.
20110109160837.000|20110109160839.000|TR0|

20110109160841.000|20110109160843.000|TR0|horrible.
20110109160843.000|20110109160845.000|TR0|
20110109160845.000|20110109160848.000|TR0|But I also -- as an opinion person, I 
20110109160848.000|20110109160850.000|TR0|could just see myself getting sucked into 
20110109160850.000|20110109160852.000|TR0|this thing where a bunch of people -- and 
20110109160852.000|20110109160854.000|TR0|there were some people.  There were people 
20110109160854.000|20110109160857.000|TR0|in the media with no impulse control.  
20110109160857.000|20110109160859.000|TR0|People like Keith Olbermann and Paul 
20110109160859.000|20110109160901.000|TR0|Krugman, who just, boom, started hitting 
20110109160901.000|20110109160903.000|TR0|Sarah Palin and, boom, started hitting the 
20110109160903.000|20110109160905.000|TR0|right before the facts were in.
20110109160905.000|20110109160908.000|TR0|
20110109160908.000|20110109160910.000|TR0|You know, it's our job to first -- it's 
20110109160910.000|20110109160912.000|TR0|not our job to give our first impulses, 
20110109160912.000|20110109160914.000|TR0|because they are often wrong.
20110109160914.000|20110109160917.000|TR0|
20110109160917.000|20110109160919.000|TR0|KURTZ:  They're often wrong.  Let me get --
20110109160919.000|20110109160921.000|TR0|
20110109160921.000|20110109160923.000|TR0|SAUNDERS:  It's our job to get the facts.
20110109160923.000|20110109160926.000|TR0|
20110109160926.000|20110109160928.000|TR0|SIMON:  Let me give you my second and 
20110109160928.000|20110109160930.000|TR0|third impulse then.
20110109160930.000|20110109160932.000|TR0|
20110109160932.000|20110109160934.000|TR0|KURTZ:  OK.
20110109160934.000|20110109160937.000|TR0|
20110109160937.000|20110109160939.000|TR0|SIMON:  I'm not ready to surrender the 
20110109160939.000|20110109160941.000|TR0|point that what Sarah Palin did by putting 
20110109160941.000|20110109160943.000|TR0|crosshairs over congressional districts 
20110109160943.000|20110109160946.000|TR0|was a good and innocent thing to do.
20110109160946.000|20110109160948.000|TR0|
20110109160948.000|20110109160950.000|TR0|KURTZ:  No, it was a dumb thing to do.
20110109160950.000|20110109160952.000|TR0|
20110109160952.000|20110109160954.000|TR0|SIMON:  More than dumb.
20110109160954.000|20110109160957.000|TR0|
20110109160957.000|20110109160959.000|TR0|KURTZ:  OK.
20110109160959.000|20110109161001.000|TR0|

20110109161934.000|20110109161936.000|TR0|immigration law last year, the fact that 
20110109161936.000|20110109161938.000|TR0|Arizona became the third state in the 
20110109161938.000|20110109161940.000|TR0|entire nation to allow anybody to carry a 
20110109161940.000|20110109161942.000|TR0|concealed weapon.  Certainly, we have got 
20110109161942.000|20110109161945.000|TR0|the focus on the fact that we have a 
20110109161945.000|20110109161947.000|TR0|governor who has supported the change in 
20110109161947.000|20110109161949.000|TR0|the law that's led people perhaps to die 
20110109161949.000|20110109161951.000|TR0|because they can't get transplants.  
20110109161951.000|20110109161954.000|TR0|Again, on the front page.
20110109161954.000|20110109161956.000|TR0|
20110109161956.000|20110109161958.000|TR0|Arizona is at the forefront of the effort 
20110109161958.000|20110109162000.000|TR0|to reinterpret the 14th Amendment.  And so 
20110109162000.000|20110109162003.000|TR0|the rhetoric is always high, and it's a 
20110109162003.000|20110109162005.000|TR0|very fine line for the politicians and for 
20110109162005.000|20110109162007.000|TR0|those of us in the media to separate out 
20110109162007.000|20110109162009.000|TR0|the rhetoric that's expected, the attacks 
20110109162009.000|20110109162011.000|TR0|on "Obamacare," and to try then to report 
20110109162011.000|20110109162014.000|TR0|it without inflaming the situation even 
20110109162014.000|20110109162016.000|TR0|further.

20110109162951.000|20110109162953.000|TR0|this case, believed to be the shooter's

20110109162955.000|20110109162957.000|TR0|about a month ago from a big gun store 
20110109162957.000|20110109162959.000|TR0|here in the Tucson area.  There have been 
20110109162959.000|20110109163002.000|TR0|reports from both the police and other 
20110109163002.000|20110109163004.000|TR0|authorities that he has had some minor
